title: Locus Settings
description: User settings for a Locus AI project (.locus/settings.json)

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor validation and autocomplete

apiUrl.description: Locus API base URL (defaults to https://api.locusai.dev/api)

provider.description: AI provider to use for agent execution

model.description: AI model to use for agent execution

workspaceId.description: The Locus workspace ID (overrides the value in config.json)

chatId.description: Telegram chat ID where the bot will send notifications

testMode.description: Enable test mode (dry run without executing tasks)
